subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan is back with the U.S. World Cup team for a qualifying match at Costa Rica on Friday night, but his role in the squad remains nebulous.
snippet: Landon Donovan is back with the U.S. World Cup team for a qualifying match at Costa Rica on Friday night, but his role in the squad remains nebulous.
